item.description:
The ride you shouldn't miss! Meet at the flag pole on the Green at 5:30 for a slow-paced bicycle ride through New Haven streets. The ride ranges from 30 minutes to over an hour depending on weather and usually ends at a house party or a New Haven spot.

Ride starts promptly at 6pm, so don't be late!

BYOB and a dish or snack for the potluck party afterwards, all are invited. If you bring jello, perhaps it's not a good idea to put it in your backpack without a lid!

Critical Mass is not an organization, it's an unorganized coincidence. It's a movement ... of bicycles, in the streets.

Look for me on my bright red Schwinn 3-speed with the chrome fenders...and I have a matching red helmet :)
Your contact is Eric, and is reachable at: 860-214.936 1

I'm setting this up on MONDAY so you'll have plenty of time to check your tires and find some bright clothing/blinky lights!
item.name: Critical Mass Bicycle Ride, 5:30pm at the flagpole on the Green!
